article: Mary has some friends. They are Betty, Peter, Alice _ Mike. Mary is the oldest of the five Betty is thirteen years old . She is younger than Mary and older than Peter. Alice is nine and Mike is seven.  Betty and Peter are _ runners. But Peter runs faster. Mary and Betty like to play basketball Mary plays better than Betty. Alice sings _ of  them. Mary and Betty study in a middle school. Alice and Mike study in a primary school. They _ work hard at school. But Betty works hardest Her handwriting is good, _ .
